message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,000,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $850,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to consider $750,000?
